text:
In this text, I will try to explain why I decide to go in Licence of Information and communication.
First of all, last year, I had to discover what I want for my futur and my professional life. So I made some researches and an internship. I became interested by the communication with the job of journalism especially reporter and « attaché de presse ».
The communication attract my interest since the last year of my high school and the fact that I was born with technologies and lot of information with the TV, smartphones, applications. For me the communication is a large field where we can learn a lot about how society works now with information processing. The communication also can open many doors to different and varies professions.
Secondly, since the age of 14 I was impressed by  reporters and journalists. I always had interest for the information on the TV for example Quotidien, on the social media like Alex Dupont and reporters. I was inspired to by the start of social media in my childhood. I made many research on how agency of managers and companies succeed to develop their marketing and their ideas on the social media : how they use communication for their own benefice and how they "démarquent" of the others.
For me this licence can permits to grow up with our society and learn how we can share information with ressources and supports we have. How we can involve with our society and understand it.
